widget.name: Feedback & Collaboration Widget
widget.description: Widget to send feedback and collaborate with others on your Mendix Project

property.caption: Decrypted Token Entity
property.description: The entity for the Decrypted Token of MendixSSO.

property.caption: Decrypted Token Value
property.description: The Value attribute of Decrypted Token of MendixSSO

property.caption: ID token provider
property.description: Microflow that will return the MendixSSO ID token. Required by App Switcher.

property.caption: User
property.description: If set, the user name and email address properties are used to prefill the user’s identity in the ‘Feedback’ submit form.

property.caption: User name attribute
property.description: Used to determine the user name of the user when sharing the application.

property.caption: Email attribute
property.description: Used to determine the email address of the user when sharing the application.

property.caption: App ID
property.description: The App ID is a hash that uniquely identifies your app project. You can find this ID in Settings > General in the Developer Portal.

property.caption: App name
property.description: The app project name used when sharing your app.

property.caption: Allow screenshots
property.description: If you are not allowed to send screenshots when submitting feedback (for legal reasons, etc.), set this to ‘No’.

property.caption: Hide Mendix logo
property.description: For customized branding, you can remove the Mendix logo from the widget.

property.caption: Edit button
property.description: Add the ‘Edit’ button to the widget menu for editing in the Web Modeler.

property.caption: Mobile view button
property.description: Add the ‘Mobile view’ button to the widget menu for opening your application via the Mendix mobile app.

property.caption: Share button
property.description: Add the ‘Share’ button to the widget menu for sharing your Mendix application.

property.caption: Feedback server location
property.description: You can configure a new feedback server location if necessary, but Mendix recommends leaving this set to the default at https://sprintr.home.mendix.com/.

property.caption: Screenshot foreign rendering
property.description: This is enabled by default and an option in HTML2Canvas. Only disable this when you experience problems with creating screenshots.

property.caption: CSS selector for a scrollable area
property.description: If you use internal scrolling inside of a div container, screenshot feature might not work correctly. This allows you to specify this area with the CSS selector.

property.caption: Show Create New App button
property.description: App Switcher modal will provide a button that allows the user to create a new Mendix app.

property.caption: Show App Switcher button
property.description: If the above microflows are configured, show the App Switcher button.

property.caption: Production microflow
property.description: An optional microflow that can be used to determine if the widget runs in production (for example, by using a constant). The return type for this microflow is a Boolean. In production, the ‘Edit’ and ‘Mobile view’ buttons are disabled by default, ‘Feedback’ is always enabled, and ‘Share’ is optional.

property.caption: Share in production
property.description: Enable or disable sharing of the app in production.
